text: varito ila anu: "Allah nu vadali miru evarinaite, (aradhyadaivaluga) bhavistunnaro, varini pilici cudandi!" Akasalalo gani mariyu bhumilo gani ravva (paramanuvu) anta vastuvupai kuda variki adhikaram ledu. Mariyu variki a rendintilo elanti bhagasvamyamu ledu. Mariyu ayanaku varilo nundi evvadu sahayakudunu kadu
